description: This rich and smokey casserole is a one pot wonder with hearty black beans.
name: Smokey Pork & Black Bean Casserole Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 700g pork shoulder steaks, trimmed and chopped
2.4 cup chicken stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. Heat the oil in a large, ovenproof casserole dish on medium high heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes.
Add the pork chunks and cook for 34 minutes until sealed on all sides. Add the garlic, chipotle paste, tomato puree and smoked paprika and cook for 2 minutes, stirring to coat.
Stir in the chicken stock and bring to a simmer. Place the lid on the casserole dish, leaving a little gap and cook in the oven for 2 hours.
Remove the lid, stir in the black beans and cook uncovered for a further 30 minutes until the sauce has reduced and the pork is tender.
